title: Yasuo's older brother 'Yone' gonna be released as new champ + mecha skin for lucian, zed, e in 5.17
body:
Current Yasuos name gonna be changed as Yone and project yasuo skin gonna be classic skin for Yone
 
Moreover there will be new champ released whos gonna be revealed as real Yasuo; who is Yones brother

Lastly project skin for zed lucian fiora and leona

I cant tell u further for security reason as otherwise rito will arrest me

replies.body:
Honestly would of been better if this was kept as a suprise, incase it were real, was it that neccessary ?
Also isn't it kind of stupid that riot would make project yasuo a classic seeing as people paid money for that ? (or am i blind)

Sorry kid, it just sounds like some fan theory imo.

That cant happen cause Yasuo was the only one in a generation that controls wind,meaning Yone doesnt so Yasuos actual abilities wouldnt make sense on Yone,also if at the end what u say happen...whats up with the money of ppl like me who bought Project Yasuo? Nice try tho
A Cyber-swordsman would be a great theme to explore.
http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/2400/9426/original.jpg you probs just saw this fan created theory lol

its not project teaser secretly obtained by my acquaintance from rito headquarter and he released it yesterday.

I told u i cannot say further as rito will sue me for releasing top secret information for upcoming patches

Anyway its time for me to call my mum and tell her i need another set of uni text book
